channel.title: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!
channel.description: Pyru has wrote a message on [url=http://RSCEmulation.net]]RSCEmulation.net][/url] about himself continuely running RSCEmulation for aslong as possible. Thank god for Pyru, an expected move made. Everyone thought Zilent would step up.

item.title: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

Dan Rein said k, it’s officially open/shut case. OP needs to request a close

Read full topic

item.title: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“elyad, post:10, topic:445256”]Luke made the RSCE what it is, Nobody else has pulled it of as good as he did, He managed RSCE so well, He kept us up to date with statistics of the site visits, unique users etc etc. He managed DDos attacks, security so well, He didnt just have people willy nilly working on the development on the site, He was very carefull of how he picked his staff so to speak. I doubt anyone will ever Replicate what he did.

Does anybody know what Luke was paying per month for the server? Because i certainly dont want to see RSCE go down the drain. It would be a horrible thing to see his work go to waste, I would be more than willing to help with certain costs of the server to keep it alive, Aslong as others were willing to help too. Its a small price to pay to keep somthing like this up. If every member payed $1 per month, The server would remain up without a doubt, This would help cover costs.

And to be honsit, I think this should be implemented as a requirement of every member. $1 is nothing.[/quote]
You’re going to have to go on the forum to discuss this, not here I’m afraid.

Read full topic
item.source: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!

item.title: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Luke made the RSCE what it is, Nobody else has pulled it of as good as he did, He managed RSCE so well, He kept us up to date with statistics of the site visits, unique users etc etc. He managed DDos attacks, security so well, He didnt just have people willy nilly working on the development on the site, He was very carefull of how he picked his staff so to speak. I doubt anyone will ever Replicate what he did.

Does anybody know what Luke was paying per month for the server? Because i certainly dont want to see RSCE go down the drain. It would be a horrible thing to see his work go to waste, I would be more than willing to help with certain costs of the server to keep it alive, Aslong as others were willing to help too. Its a small price to pay to keep somthing like this up. If every member payed $1 per month, The server would remain up without a doubt, This would help cover costs.

And to be honsit, I think this should be implemented as a requirement of every member. $1 is nothing.

Read full topic
item.source: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!

item.title: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:4, topic:445256”]Well I guess we know him as the rsc man but we should appreciate him for him
Not his rsc[/quote]
There are MANY that doesn’t him personally, so it would be hard for us, like me, don’t get me wrong, I appreciate what he did for RSC, and his personality was quite intelligent (based upon his posts). Other than that, that’s all I knew about him, I’m afraid.

As far appreciating him in the RSC part, I suppose that’s how (in another way) of people appreciating him because that was what he gave his community.

Read full topic
item.source: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!

item.title: RSCEmulation is to officially possibly stay!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:3, topic:445256”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=547936.msg4017844#msg4017844 date=1339783313]
But still why does it have to be a happy thing? Luke is no longer running the server which is still a very sad thing.
[/quote]
This is true, but at least the administrator running it now is keeping his legacy alive, I wish he could have picked the administrator he wanted to run the server in his death but obviously that isn’t/wasn’t going to happen.[/quote]
Well I guess we know him as the rsc man but we should appreciate him for him
Not his rsc

Read full topic
